text: ‘Tomaloke mora ocarata lora patasamuha ani diya’, arasesata madhyararti khali tha'i purna hai yetiya lohastupa duyo parbatara samana ha’la tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘etiya phum di thaka’. Tara pichata yetiya se'ito ju'ita parainata ha’la, tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke mora ocarata galita tama lai aha, ma'i iyara oparata dhali di'om’
